title: #260: The Michael Jackson of Helping Sick Children (@SteveSimeone)
itunes:title: The Michael Jackson of Helping Sick Children with Steve Simeone
description: Steve Simeone and I had some dinner, watched a college basketball game, and talked about all the time he spends over at Children's Hospital. He's been going over there all the time for over a year now. He hangs out with the sick kids and just kind of plays with them. And he does it all the time. It's a really nice story.
